thread.title: Trump warns Iran not to re-start nuke program

title: Trump warns Iran not to re-start nuke program
text:
Trump warns Iran not to re-start nuke program Wednesday, May 09, 2018 - 01:56
U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said there would be 'consequences' if Iran re-started its nuclear programs, a warning coming a day after Trump pull the U.S. out of an international agreement that put limits on Tehran's ability to enrich nuclear material.
U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said there would be 'consequences' if Iran re-started its nuclear programs, a warning coming a day after Trump pull the U.S. out of an international agreement that put limits on Tehran's ability to enrich nuclear material. //reut.rs/2G0lg1L
